documentation.text:
@title ISwitchboard
 @notice Interface for the Switchboard contract

@notice Get the total number of active feeds
 @return count The number of feeds that have been updated

@notice Get all active feed IDs
 @return feedIds Array of all feed IDs that have been updated

@notice Get the update fee
 @return The fee required for updates in wei

@notice Gets the verifier contract address
 @return The address of the verifier contract

@notice Gets the implementation address
 @return The address of the implementation contract

@notice Get contract version
 @return version The contract version

@notice Settle randomness from encoded oracle response
 @param encodedRandomness The encoded randomness reveal data (discriminator 4)

@title SwitchboardTypes
 @notice Library containing types used across the Switchboard oracle system
@notice Packed size constants for data layout compatibility

@notice Requests randomness for a specific game round.
 @param roundId The unique round identifier.

randomness id"},"returns":{"_0":"The randomness struct"}},"implementation()":{"returns":{"_0":"The address of the implementation contract"}},"isFeedActive(bytes32)":{"params":{"feedId":"The feed ID to delay has passed"}},"latestUpdate(bytes32)":{"details":"This is for backwards compatibility with the old Switchboard contractsIntended to be called within the same transaction as a feed update for the most up-to-date data.Reverts if the feed does not have the minimum number of valid responses","params":{"feedId":"The identifier for the feed to get the latest update for"},"returns":{"_0":"Update The latest update for the given feed (LegacyUpdate format for ABI compatibility)"}},"rerollRandomness(bytes32)":{"details":"Caller must be the authority for this randomness","params":{"randomnessId":"The randomness id to reroll"},"returns":{"oracle":"The new oracle address selected"}},"rerollRandomnessWithOracle(bytes32,address)":{"details":"Caller must be the authority for this randomness","params":{"oracle":"The specific oracle address to fulfill this request","randomnessId":"The randomness id to reroll"}},"settleRandomness(bytes)":{"params":{"encodedRandomness":"The encoded randomness reveal data (discriminator 4)"}},"updateFee()":{"returns":{"_0":"The fee required for updates in wei"}},"updateFeeds(bytes)":{"params":{"feeds":"The encoded feed update data as bytes"},"returns":{"updateData":"The parsed FeedUpdateData struct"}},"updateFeeds(bytes[])":{"details":"This is for backwards compatibility with Switchboard on-demand contractsreverts if the timestamp is out of valid range (optional flow for timestamp-sequenced updates)","params":{"updates":"Encoded switchboard update(s) with signatures"}},"verifierAddress()":{"returns":{"_0":"The address of the verifier contract"}},"version()":{"returns":{"_0":"version The contract version"}}},"title":"ISwitchboard","version":1},"userdoc":{"kind":"user","methods":{"createRandomness(bytes32,uint64)":{"notice":"Create a randomness request with auto-selected oracle"},"createRandomnessWithOracle(bytes32,uint64,address)":{"notice":"Create a randomness request with a specific oracle"},"feedExists(bytes32)":{"notice":"Check if a feed exists"},"findCurrentResult(bytes32)":{"notice":"Calculate current result for a feed"},"getActiveFeedCount()":{"notice":"Get the total number of active feeds"},"getActiveFeedIds(uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"Get a paginated list of active feed IDs"},"getAllActiveFeedIds()":{"notice":"Get all active feed IDs"},"getFee(bytes[])":{"notice":"Get the fee in wei for submitting a set of updates"},"getFeedValue((uint64,uint64,(bytes32,int128,uint8)[],bytes[]),bytes32)":{"notice":"Gets a verified feed value or reverts"},"getLatestUpdate(bytes32)":{"notice":"Get the latest update for a feed"},"getLatestValue(bytes32)":{"notice":"Get the latest value for a feed"},"getRandomness(bytes32)":{"notice":"Get randomness data by id"},"implementation()":{"notice":"Gets the implementation address"},"isFeedActive(bytes32)":{"notice":"Check if a feed ID is active"},"isRandomnessReady(bytes32)":{"notice":"Check if randomness is ready to be settled"},"latestUpdate(bytes32)":{"notice":"Get the latest Update struct for a feed"},"rerollRandomness(bytes32)":{"notice":"Reroll randomness with auto-selected
